description:
Seth dreams of being a great sorcerer. He wants to be powerful and defeat the Némésis, monsters that come down from the sky. But his eagerness constantly gets him into trouble. He can’t seem to avoid angering the villagers and even his guardian, Alma. One day, an enormous Némésis really attacks the village! Determined to save the world, Seth embarks on a journey in search for the “Radiant,” the legendary lair of the Némésis. Making new friends, fighting tough enemies, and confronting hardships, Seth’s adventure begins!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Witch
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a witch.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Age Regression
tags.description: Prominently features a character who was returned to a younger state.

tags.name: Dissociative Identities
tags.description: A case where one or more people share the same body.

tags.name: Fugitive
tags.description: Prominently features a character evading capture by an individual or organization.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

name.native: バグリオーレ・ウルミナ

node.description: [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/tonytonyvalente/) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@tonyvalenteofficial) | Wiki (en) Tony Valente is a French comic book author. He is the first author of "French Mangas" to be published in Japan, for his work Radiant, through the publisher Asukashinsha in the Euromanga1 collection as well as with the help of [Yusuke Murata](https://anilist.co/staff/96903/Yuusuke-Murata) and [Hiro Mashima](https://anilist.co/staff/96882/Hiro-Mashima).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/daiki_fukuoka)

**Daiki Fukuoka** is a Japanese director, episode director, production manager and storyboard artist.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/995498317)

Interested in films and comics from his early childhood on. After graduating high school he went to Yoyogi Animation Gakuin and afterwards started working as animator for [Ajia-do](https://anilist.co/studio/30/). After becoming a freelancer for a short time, he joined Logistics where he worked in the software development section and was responsible for animation work and later developing tools for animation work in games. In 2002 he founded [Team Till Dawn](https://anilist.co/studio/6412/), which was also the beginning of his career as anime director.

His hobbies outside of work include bodybuilding, in which he has gone as far as to take part in competitions

Members:

- Harushi Ejima - guitarist
- Yuki Uemura - bassist
- Kazuma Mitsuyasu - drummer

**04 Limited Sazabys** is a four-member punk-rock band formed in Nagoya, Japan in 2008.

The band consists of Ba/Vo [GEN](https://anilist.co/staff/351519/GEN), Gt HIROKAZ, Gt/Cho RYU-TA and Dr/Cho KOUHEI. 04LS made their major debut from Nippon Columbia with the 1st full album 'CAVU' in 2015.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/erickbglx) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/erickbglx/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/ErickDublou)

Erick Bougleux is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, and dubbing director.
A Mexican voice actress. She is known for being the Latin American Spanish voice of Nurse Joy in _Pokémon_ and Felicity Smoak/Overwatch  in the _Arrowverse_.
